Description:
It was quite fun! As you went down the waterfall you realised there was something behind it.

You come out of the barrels and behind the waterfall you find a suspicious door half open.

You look inside carefully and see a room with torches where a group of pigmen are attending a meeting and listening to a high-ranking sectarian.
DescriptionAction: What do you want to do?
